## getCurrentUrlPrefix() function

Gets current URL prefix (contains protocol and host)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getCurrentUrlPrefix(document: HTMLDocument): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  document | <code>HTMLDocument</code> | Html document to be used for computation of current URL prefix |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
